Name: Complete Purchase Process with Billing and Shipping Information
Description: Navigate to the home page, select a product, add it to the cart, and proceed to checkout. Fill in billing and shipping details, and verify the home page after completion.

Step 2: Click on image card
Step 3: Click on link buyNow -> Navigate to page '/product/*'

Step 5: Click on button addToCart
